column5: Well it's that time if year guy's I'll be going up to guide at Sabourin lake Lodge this year and I'll see you all in sept with lots of pic of big pike, eyes and smalls!!  Hope you all have a good summer and be safe out there! I want to see lots of pics of some BIG fish when I come back  If you guy's want some good fishing and are looking to get out of southern ont take a look at the lodge... What a place and there are some good guides there to;D  http://www.sabourinlake.com/index.shtml
have fun Adam and get your customers a new PB!
yep... i wish i was going with u.....
Hey,  Was Solo paddler there? Seems like he's got the look....
C'mon man my pike are waaay bigger than that!   Ah to be young again. Have a great summer up there, I'm very envious.
I think Ron was suggesting the facial features of the lad more than the pike.....
Thanks for pointing that out I never would have figured it out.
hey,   how come evrybody pickin on the solo look?
Nice place, but at a whopping 1000 bucks a nite for two I`ll have to win a lottery to afford that!
While it looks like a great place, the price of almost $600 for the flight and $495pp per night is a little beyond my budget... for that price you could go to BC for salmon...
Great and safe time to you up there! Take lots of pics too! Please
Will do  you can bet on that one  Thanks guys
